page.title: 15Brisley-Children's Clubs
page.content: {Discos}are held in Brisley Village Hall every month or two months, for under 16s. The people who go to the Discos can go on outings e.g. to Alton Towers. Children living in the area take part in organizations in other places: {Tennis coaching}is held once a year at Fakenham High School.People are taught how to serve and play different strokes. Some girls belong to{Brownies and {Guides}in Fakenham.They have activities in groups,refreshments and play games.Some boys belong to{Cubs}in Elmham or Fakenham.In the summer they go camping in tents. {Fakenham Swimming Club}has lessons on several evenings.It has a gala every year.{Dancing classes}are held in Dereham and Fakenham, people learn modern, tap and ballet.
